channel.title: Inclusive Practices on Laura Anthony - Speaker & Neuroinclusive Leader

item.title: A Leadership Mindset for All Minds
item.description: Leadership is evolving and one of the most transformative shifts is the recognition and leveraging of neurodiversity within teams. This session equips team leaders to foster neuroinclusion in talent acquisition and development, moving beyond accommodations to systems where all minds thrive. By understanding how we think and communicate differently, attendees will learn to how be an inclusive leader, reduce bias and build collaborative teams where neurodiversity drives innovation and growth. This isn’t just a talk about inclusionâ€”it’s a practical roadmap to help leaders innovate and harness their team’s full potential.
